title: tozhuvEn murugA
sahitya:
tozhuvEn murugA un kazhalaDiyai nidam nAn


anupallavi

  pazhanyam pati mEvum parama kauNAnidhiyE pazha vinai enaduDanE parandODi viDak-kOri


caraNam    tunbamEdum toDarAda inba vAzhvIndiDa annaipOl ennai nI anbODu aNaindiDa
enniru karam Endi idayam karaindiDavE pan murai dinam tOrum bhakti paravashattODu
